details.brokersummary:
Beautifully Renovated & Spacious 3 Bedroom with Private Backyard
Hot & Cold Water + Cooking Gas Included In-Unit Washer and Dryer Close to Myrtle J, M, Z Trains Open Kitchen with Stainless Steel Appliances & Dishwasher Ample Closet Space Hardwood Flooring Generously Sized Bedrooms Steps Away from Coffee Shops, Delis, Bars, and More To Schedule a Viewing, Call, Text, or Email Us Today!

Spacious new development in prime Bushwick!
Be the first to live here. Incredible 2 bedroom 1 bath with all the bells and whistles. Great shared backyard space! Laundry in the unit, dishwasher, and central AC. Top of the line stainless steel appliances. Each bedroom is on the opposite side for ultimate privacy, with a big living room/kitchen area in between. The exposed brick and beams add a dynamic element to the apartment.
The building features a gorgeous roof deck with skyline views, and comfy patio furniture for your enjoyment. Storage in the basement.
Myrtle-Wyckoff L and M trains just 1 block away. Surrounded by top rated restaurants and bars - Dromedary Tiki Bar, Milk & Pull Coffee, L'imprimerie Bakery, Boobie Trap Bar, Bushwick Burger Co, Williamsburg Pizza, and many more.
Small pets welcome No broker fee

Myspace Exclusive! Gorgeous renovation in historic prewar building steps from the Myrtle JMZ in prime Bushwick, only a short stroll from the Morgan/Jefferson L!
This beautiful two bedroom features high ceilings, exposed brick, custom moldings, separate eat-in kitchen w/ island, dishwasher, separate living room with tons of natural light, two evenly sized queen bedrooms with closets, lovely hardwood floors, tons of natural light in every room, washer/dryer in unit, additional coat/storage closet in hallway leading to luxe modern bathroom w/ deep soaking tub.
Tucked away from street noise on the second floor facing the back of the property, you will sleep sound! Surrounded by the best selection of bars, restaurants, music/art venues, thrift shops, grocery stores, and transportation options! Steps from Myrtle JMZ express to Lower Manhattan, or a short stroll to the L train at either Morgan or Jefferson!
Only first & security! Heat & hot water included!

Myspace Exclusive! Beautiful pre-war 2 bedroom in Prime Williamsburg
Located at Roebling and South 3rd --- 4 minutes to the Marcy JMZ
2 big sunny bedrooms real living room with great layout ? fits a sofa, coffee table and TV separate kitchen tons of natural light in all rooms
Includes heat and hot water
NO BROKER FEE

Tucked away from street noise on the second floor facing the back of the property, you will sleep sound! Only first & security! Heat & hot water included!

Nice new 1 bedroom apartment in East Williamsburg - just around the corner from the Montrose L and Lorimer J/M trains.
The apartment features: Hardwood floors, sunny kitchen with stainless steel appliances, 1 queen size and 1 twin size bedroom. Heat and hot Water is included. Could be used as a 1 bedroom --OR--- 1 bedroom + office ---OR--- 2 bedroom with small living area. The choice is yours!
Surrounded by the best local bars, restaurants, cafes, and a short commute to Manhattan!
Sept 1 move in Small pets OK

Myspace Exclusive!
Gorgeous 1.5 bedroom apartment in East Williamsburg ? just around the corner from the Montrose L and Lorimer J/M trains.
The apartment features: hardwood floors, spacious kitchen with stainless steel appliances, large living room, 1 queen size bedroom and 1 full size bedroom. Gorgeous exposed brick. Heat & Hot Water is included. Surrounded by the best local bars, restaurants, cafes, and a short commute to Manhattan!
Available 9/1 On-Site Super Small pets OK No broker fee

Incredible, newly renovated huge 1-bedroom in Williamsburg right off the subway in Prime Williamsburg! Right by the waterfront.
Oak hardwood floors, high ceilings, and large windows letting in tons of natural light! Nice L-shaped living/dining area, creating 2 separate spaces.
- Big bedroom with closet - Renovated kitchen with stainless steel appliances, microwave - Elevator building - On-Site Super
JMZ trains, Domino Park, Peter Luger's, Pies-N-Thighs, Social House Cafe, Deux Chats, Patrizia's of Williamsburg, etc nearby.
No broker fee Available 9/1 Small pets welcome

Gorgeous two bedroom apartment in East Williamsburg - just around the corner from the Montrose L and Lorimer J/M trains. Could also be used a 1 bedroom plus home office. The apartment features: Hardwood floors, Spacious et-in style kitchen with stainless steel appliances, Large living room, 1 queen size and 1 twin size bedroom. Heat & Hot Water is included and there is rooftop access. Surrounded by the best local bars, restaurants, cafes, and a short commute to Manhattan!
September 1 move in Small pets OK No broker fee

Myspace Exclusive!
Gorgeous Junior two bedroom apartment in East Williamsburg ? just around the corner from the Montrose L and Lorimer J/M trains.

Nice new 1 bedroom apartment in East Williamsburg - just around the corner from the Montrose L and Lorimer J/M trains.
The apartment features: Hardwood floors, sunny kitchen with stainless steel appliances, and heat and hot water is included.
Surrounded by the best local bars, restaurants, cafes, and a short commute to Manhattan! Montrose L train.
Sept 1 move in Small pets OK

Myspace Exclusive!
Virtual tours available! Reside in a gorgeous 2 bed / 1 bath apartment with stainless steel appliances, hardwood floors, natural sunlight, modern features, and easy access to trains. To live in Crown Heights is to live in convenience and a diverse community. Enjoy the luxury of having access to most train lines like the 2,3,4,5 and C, or switch to any letter train at Atlantic terminal. Enjoy a short walk to Brooklyn Museum, Prospect Park, and Botanic Garden. Crown Heights offers a number of local restaurants and bars like Chavela?s, Dutch Boy, Cent?Anni, Drink Lounge, 99 Rogers, Mayfield, Cafe Rue Dix, Glady?s and more! Easy commute to Manhattan & easy access to the rest of Brooklyn?s hottest neighborhoods.
9/1 move in Small pets welcome

Myspace Exclusive!
1 bedroom layout with extra office! Stainless steel appliances, eat in kitchen. Nice layout!
The building is an extremely well-maintained 1920s prewar featuring stainless appliances, hardwood floors, tons of sunlight, high ceilings and lots of space. Pet friendly, heat & hot water included!
Call today, as this listing will not last.
June 1st move in Small pets OK No broker fee

MySpace exclusive!
Spacious one bedroom in well maintained pre war building in Williamsburg. Large living room perfect for entertaining. Updated kitchen with stainless steel appliances. Short walk to the J,M,G and L trains. Super easy to get anywhere! Pies-n-Thighs, The Rosemont, Testo, Align Coffee, Williamsburg Pizza, Modern Love Vega, etc all nearby. Incredible Williamsburg location.
Available 9/1 Small pets OK Broker fee applies

Nice 3 bed just 1 block from PROSPECT PARK!!
- Hardwood Floors Throughout - 3 Great Sized Bedrooms - Separate Living Room - Small Pets Welcome - Heat/Hot Water Included
You will not beat this apartment. The B/Q train is literally around the corner and so it PROSPECT PARK!! The neighborhood is so great with bars, grocery, and restaurants everywhere. These apartment don?t last long so take a look today.
Small pets OK Available now

- Located at Clarkson & East 46t Street ? In a well-maintained, secured entry building with an elevator. ? Close to Kingsbrook and Kings County Hospital. ? It's a short bus ride to the 2, 3, 4, & 5 train. ? Lots of natural sunlight, good closet space ? Super and laundry on site

Awesome new 2 bedroom for September 1st! Rent stabilized!
- 2 big bedrooms - Large living area - Newly renovated
Laundry in building Shared roof deck
Perfect location! Birdy's, Hart Bar, Rebecca's Bar, Santa Panaza Italian, Lone Wolf, Marco's etc. JMZ only 1 block away.
September 1st move in Pets OK for additional fee

Virtual Tour Available! Beautiful 1.5 BR/1bath apartment in fabulous Bushwick!This apartment is in the pindrop-quiet "rear" building of this unique courtyard complex! It's like your own little treehouse in the middle of Bushwick. You'll be right around the corner from dozens of top-rated bars, restaurants, cafes, grocers, and music/art venues. Local favorites include Mominette, Sea Wolf, Three Diamond Door, Precious Metal, The Rookery, Archie's, Heavy Woods, Idlewild, Clara's, Yours Sincerely, Chuko, Los Hermanos, Wheelhouse.No brokers fee!Only First & SecurityContact to schedule your appointment today!

Live next to the action in this 2 bedroom apartment located in prime downtown Bushwick! Stunning unit in a very convenient location and borderline East Williamsburg. Only 1 block away from the L Jefferson for a reduced commute, and next to Bushwick's popular restaurants: Cafe Ghia, Bunna Cafe, Mominette Bistro! Laundry in building for your convenience & pet friendly building too!

2br / 1bath with laundry in the building and roof deck! Huge windows in the bedrooms (south facing) Cutout window to bring more light into the large living room Butcher block countertops Hardwood floors Dishwasher Microwave Roof deck Laundry in the building Faces away from the street
NO fee Pets ok Just 1st and security to move in Call or text to see right away!

SUNNY 1 bed / 1 bath in an elevator building. Facing the City and the building?s internal courtyard! Tons of natural light coming into all areas of the apt. New construction built into what used to be a school attached a renovated 145yo church converted into apartments.
This spacious 1br but has beautiful finishes and lots of natural light.
Unit features: Hardwood floors Dishwasher Stainless steel appliances Custom kitchen and bath Separate efficient PTAC heat and cooling units in both rooms. Large windows throughout bringing light into the entire apartment Owner will purchase additional armoire / standing closet for the bedroom
Building features: ButterflyMX intercom Laundry room Huge Roof deck Parking (based on availability) Zipcars available Bike storage Go Lockers for shipping and receiving packages securely State-of-the-art security system throughout
Fantastic location close to tons of local spots as well as a 2min walk to the Myrtle/Broadway JMZ and 12min to the L train.
NO BROKER FEE!! Just 1st and security to move in! Pets ok!
Contact us to set up a viewing right away!

Huge private terrace plus private balcony in corner unit penthouse dream apt. Skyline views!
Unit features: Hardwood floors Dishwasher Stainless steel appliances Custom kitchen and bath Separate efficient PTAC heat and cooling units in all rooms. Pets ok! NO BROKER FEE! Just 1st and security to move in!

Chic 2.5 Bedroom Apartment with massive private balcony right in the Heart of Bushwick! Owner will also purchase standing closets if you want. One bedroom is smaller with a window bringing light in from the back bedroom. It's perfect as an office / extra common space , or as a small 3rd bedroom for someone who's budget is less. See video for layout . 1min walk to the Dekalb L. 5min to the M train.
Featuring: -Private Balcony with access from both bedrooms - Large Open Living Room - Queen Size Bedrooms - Stainless Steel Appliances - Including Dishwasher - And Microwave! - Laundry in Building - Large windows - Plenty of sunlight! - Elevator - 2 huge Roof decks - Off street Parking with Bluetooth door opener ? Designated parking spots $250/mo - Zipcar in Garage
Such a great location, with tons of cafe?s, bars and restaurants within a five minute walk! Variety Coffee, Taquiera Cocoyoc, Milk and Pull, The Johnson?s, Maria Hernandez Park, and many more!
Just first and security to move in. NO BROKER FEE!! Call or text to set up viewing right away.

Huge renovated 2.5br. These have been used at 3brs in the past and each room has a private entrance and window but very little common space. Works a lot better as a large 2br with one of the additional rooms used as common space. You?ll get a sense of the space by seeing the video. If you can?t see it, please see the listing on StreetEasy or text me and I can send it to you. note . the apartment is unfurnished and do not come with bed frames show in photos
This apt is beautifully renovated with: Hardwood floors Dishwasher Stainless steel appliances Windows in all bedrooms plus a small skylight in the living room Heat/AC units in each room allowing you to control temp per room (huge savings on utilities) Laundry in the building Owner will purchase standing closets if needed. Fantastic locations with tons of local spots to enjoy Located 2min walk to L and M train lines in prime Bushwick (myrtle/wyckoff stop of L/M)
Pets ok No broker fee Just 1st and security to move in
Call or text to take a look right away!

3 room / 1 bath PENTHOUSE with private roof deck! Lots of light in this unit, vaulted ceilings too. Skylights Laundry in building Its? a 4th floor walkup, no elevator. Gorgeous apartment.

Welcome to 487 Keap, a brand new rental building seconds to Metropolitan/Union Avenue L train Very well maintained ? beautiful common areas including a landscaped roof deck with lounge chairs, bar, and outdoor shower. Full service and spacious gym, bike and additional storage are available.
This apartment is rent stabilized, you can enjoy a rent stabilized home, be protected from sharp increases in rent and have the right to renew your lease for years to come.

Do not miss out on this 3BR/1baths apartment in Brooklyn's up and coming neighborhood Prospect Lefferts Gardens! People forget that Brooklyn is the biggest borough and offers some of the best, historic architecture. Enjoy the neighborhoods easy access to the B,Q,2,3 lines, a number of bus lines, and short walk to Prospect Park. Live within steps to juice bars, grocery stores, restaurants, coffee shops, bars, pharmacies, banks, local bakeries, and more to explore. Brooklyn Greenery, MIdwood Flats, Irv's, Bluebird, Blessings, and Food Sermon are just a couple of the many options to check out in this vibrant neighborhood.Easy commute to Manhattan & easy access to the rest of Brooklyn's hottest neighborhoods.

You'll be right around the corner from McCarren & McGolrick Parks, in addition to dozens of top-rated bars, restaurants, cafes, grocers, and music/art venues. Welcome to Casa Hope Williamsburg?s new luxury development!
Sunny units with oversized windows throughout, and gorgeous finishes Steps from the L / G trains, commute to Union Square in only 13 minutes door to door!
Tons of building amenities:
Fitness center Rooftop terrace Business center On-site garage parking Lounge on 7th floor Mini lounge nook to each floor Elevator Bike room Parking garage (additional fee)
The kitchen comes equipped with brand new stainless steel appliances including a dishwasher. Gorgeous well-designed light wood cabinetry, white stone countertops and backsplashes. Modern bathrooms feature a deep soaking spa bathtub, as well as modern vanity with oversized mirror, storage cabinet space and matte black finishes. Other features include oak flooring throughout and generous closet space. Trash Chute to each floor.
Perfect location with an easy commute to the city and tons of restaurants, bars and cafes nearby Short walk from McCarren Park and the Bedford L train area

Experience Brooklyn living at 1010 Pacific St. You?ll find this community in the Prospect Heights area of Brooklyn. Experience a new standard at 1010 Pacific St.
Pacific House offers a collection of Studio, 1 and 2 Bedroom luxury apartments featuring expansive, open- concept layouts, oak floors and contemporary finishes. Residents also enjoy unparalleled access to first-class amenities, including fitness center, dedicated kids? areas, media lounge and bar and an expansive roof top with view of the city. Pacific House is centrally located in the heart of Brooklyn?s trendy prospect park neighborhood, and in close proximity to major transit hubs and an array of local amenities. Nearby shops, restaurants, schools, outdoor parks, neighborhood services, arts and culture are all within easy reach.

77 Commercial is a new landmark on the north edge of the Greenpoint, Brooklyn waterfront, situated between two great outdoor spaces ? a beautiful, lushly landscaped inner court to the east, and the long anticipated Box Street Park to the west.
Discover a range of living spaces tailored to your needs, including studios, 1-bedroom, 2-bedroom, and 3-bedroom layouts.
Apartment Features: -Expansive living areas boasting breathtaking views -Fully equipped kitchens with stainless steel appliances -Dishwasher -In-unit washer/dryer for added convenience -Individual AC/Heat units -Big windows inviting abundant natural light -Soaring high ceilings and elegant hardwood floors
Building Amenities: -State-of-the-art fitness center -Relaxing sauna -Basketball and tennis courts -Inviting indoor pool with direct access to outdoor pool deck -Multiple BBQ grilling areas -Rooftop retreat offering panoramic views -Residents lounge and versatile working space -Entertainment-filled recreation room -Secure bicycle storage -Convenient elevators -Parking garage available (additional fee applies)
Location: Enjoy seamless access to the new esplanade and ferry terminal, ensuring swift commutes to Manhattan.

77 Commercial is a new landmark on the north edge of the Greenpoint, Brooklyn waterfront, situated between two great outdoor spaces ? a beautiful, lushly landscaped inner court to the east, and the long anticipated Box Street Park to the west.
Discover a range of living spaces tailored to your needs, including studios, 1-bedroom, 2-bedroom, and 3-bedroom layouts.

Location: Enjoy seamless access to the new esplanade and ferry terminal, ensuring swift commutes to Manhattan.
